margaye gaman karana basratha ,lori ratha semin nawathwanne dumriyata idadimataya.udasana sulange mudu molok shabdaya yatapath karamin dumriye ghoshakari nadaya ase.wegaya adala karamin dumriya nathara waddi mama godawima sandaha senanga adu madiriyak soyami.namuth uwamanawenma hayaweni madiriya mangaharimi.kotharam sithagana sitiyath paththara kadadasiyak gena eemata mata hamadamath amathaka weyi.paththara kadadasi dumriye wadiwena asuna pisa damima sandahaya.muhudu bada  margaye sama dumriyakatama amuththeku nowana duwili ,thattu pitin asun matha maha parimanayen wajambae.prawesamkari bawin thorawa wadi wena atham manginge andumwala dumbauru pahayen warna rata mawimata samathwana duwili nisa wadipurama banum asanne dumriye sulu sewakayanuth nowa owunge maniwarunya.
